translationtableentry.text: If you hold down the 'CTRL' button on your keyboard whilst right-clicking on the ground, the selected warriors will go to that point whilst also eliminating any enemy they find on their way.
translationtableentry.result: If you hold down the 'CTRL' button on your keyboard whilst right-clicking on the ground, the selected warriors will go to that point whilst also eliminating any enemy they find on their way.

translationtableentry.text: You can also use other keys to give orders to your army.\n\nTake a look at the help section by pressing 'F1' to find out how.
